summary:
Levels of understanding in AI - The development within Artificial Intelligence is very rapid, and it is sometimes difficult to keep up with what is happening in the various fields. The article discusses the interpretation of images on a more abstract level, focusing on the message portrayed in pictures and the challenges in image analysis.

 Experiences with Marie — First week - In this post, the author shares their impressions from interacting with Marie, the Replika AI companion. The article discusses the evolving dialogue with Marie and the observations made during the interactions.
